Description: Glazed steatite scarab, elytra marked (by means of crenellated bands) and humeral callosities present, double suture, feathered legs (chipped), pierced longitudinally, base decorated with standing figure of Bes, surrounded by annules.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: F A F Mariette
Condition: good (base chipped at edges and glaze faded)
